channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Media Encoder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Media Encoder

item.title: CVE-2020-9649|2024-08-04T10:34:39.941Z -- adobe -- adobe%20media%20encoder
item.description: Adobe Media Encoder versions 14.2 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-9650|2024-08-04T10:34:39.893Z -- adobe -- adobe%20media%20encoder
item.description: Adobe Media Encoder versions 14.2 and earlier have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-9646|2024-08-04T10:34:39.893Z -- adobe -- adobe%20media%20encoder
item.description: Adobe Media Encoder versions 14.2 and earlier have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-3764|2024-08-04T07:44:50.366Z -- adobe -- adobe%20media%20encoder
item.description: Adobe Media Encoder versions 14.0 and earlier have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution .
